code: import{FETCH_ALL,CREATE,UPDATE,DELETE,LIKE}from'../constants/actionTypes';import*as api from'../api/index.js';export const getPosts=()=>async dispatch=>{try{const{data}=await api.fetchPosts();dispatch({type:FETCH_ALL,payload:data});}catch(error){console.log(error.message);}};export const createPost=post=>async dispatch=>{try{const{data}=await api.createPost(post);dispatch({type:CREATE,payload:data});}catch(error){console.log(error.message);}};export const updatePost=(id,post)=>async dispatch=>{try{const{data}=await api.updatePost(id,post);dispatch({type:UPDATE,payload:data});}catch(error){console.log(error.message);}};export const likePost=id=>async dispatch=>{try{const{data}=await api.likePost(id);dispatch({type:LIKE,payload:data});}catch(error){console.log(error.message);}};export const deletePost=id=>async dispatch=>{try{await api.deletePost(id);dispatch({type:DELETE,payload:id});}catch(error){console.log(error.message);}};
